definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: Remember, too, that I’m my wife’s grandson.
sentences.chinese: 還要記住，我還是我妻子的外孫子。

sentences.english: Jackson is my daughter's son. He is just 4 years old this year.
sentences.chinese: 傑克遜是我的外孫子，今年剛剛4歲。

sentences.english: Tom spends all her free time to stay with her grandchildren.
sentences.chinese: 湯姆花費了所有的業餘時間和她的外孫子們在一起。
